message: This is a high-quality product. It's a great opportunity to get a premium item at a competitive price of $100. I'm willing to offer a 10% discount if you buy it now, but that's as low as I can go. What do you say?
I'd like to pass on this one. I'm not sure it's a good deal, even with the discount.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that this is a one-time offer. If you don't take it, I'll have to move on to the next product, and I'm not sure when I'll have another high-quality one available. Would you like to know the average rating of this product from previous customers?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not convinced. I'd like to know the average rating, but I'm still not willing to buy at $100.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your interest in the product. The average rating for this product from previous customers is 4.8/5, with many reviewers praising its exceptional quality and performance. This way, you can be sure you're getting the quality you're looking for, and I'm willing to take on the risk. I appreciate the guarantee, but I'm still not willing to pay $100 for a product that's only worth $120 to me. I'd like to see what the next product is.

I'll take the product at $90. I think that's a fair price for a high-quality product.
